dcterms:creator: F. Ringeval
M. Valstar
J. Driscoll
X. Chen
R. Hosseini Ghomi
dcterms:description: The Extended Distress Analysis Interview Corpus Wizard of Oz (E-DAIC) dataset includes semi-clinical interviews intended to assist in diagnosing psychological distress conditions, including depression, anxiety, and post-traumatic stress disorder. It comprises 275 interviews conducted by an animated virtual interviewer named Ellie and by an AI-based agent.
dcterms:title: Extended Distress Analysis Interview Corpus Wizard of Oz (E-DAIC)

dcterms:creator: J. Gratch
D. DeVault
dcterms:description: The Distress Analysis Interview Corpus (DAIC) consists of human and computer interviews designed to assess psychological distress and depression. It serves as a resource for developing and testing algorithms for depression detection.
dcterms:title: Distress Analysis Interview Corpus (DAIC)
